title: world frame not accessible on field in local setup

content.raw:
We are setting up a local environment that mimics the competition setup for practice. We are running Gazebo and srcsim on one server and connecting to it from Field computer. Field computer runs our code. However, we are unable to access world frame in the field computer. All other frames are accessible. World frame is accessible on the simulation machine, but not on the field.
Is there any specific setting required for world frame to be accessible outside of simulation machine?
